title: Different Kinds of Sharks
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 51 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 160L
description: Sharks are powerful animals that come in many shapes and sizes. Different Kinds of Sharks builds upon children's fascination with these sea animals to teach simple information about the differences among various shark species. Striking photographs support the text.
reviewWords: different, sharks, sharp, spots, stripes, teeth
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial and Final Consonants                : Discriminate initial and final consonant /s/ sound
phonics: Consonants : Identify initial and final consonant Ss
grammar: Capitalization                : Capitalize the beginning of sentences
